keybindings.toggle-skills-hint: The skill list placement can be selected in the module settings. When using a collapsible list, if the panel is already open, this will toggle skills open and closed and if the tray is not open, it will be opened with skills visible. When the skill list is placed at the bottom, this key will scroll to reveal the skill list.

settings.tray-display-hint: Toggle - only hide tray when toggled (using hot key) / When token selected - Hide the tray if no tokens are selected, show otherwise / Automatic - Toggle for players, When token selected for the GM
settings.assume-default-character-hint: When no other token is selected, show the tray for the user's default character (usually only set for players). This can help with scenes with no tokens (or a generic party token) visible.
settings.use-control-button: Include a toggle button in token controls
settings.show-no-uses: Show items with no uses left
settings.show-unprepared-cantrips: Show cantrips even if they are not prepared
settings.skill-mode-hint: If "Collapsible at the top" is selected, the skill toggle hot key (in control settings) can be used to toggle the skill list open and closed, opening the panel if needed. If skills are at the bottom of the panel, the hotkey automatically scrolls to reveal them.
settings.skill-mode-append: At the bottom of the panel
